name: Stacking Up
description:
You are Stack doll. You are stuck inside some kind of box. Find other dolls like you, Stack up! And find a way out of the box!

Controls
  • A or Arrow left - move left
  • D or Arrow right - move right
  • W or Arrow up - jump
Gameplay Tips
  1. Touch other dolls to stack up and get bigger
  2. If doll is too big, you cannot stack up with it
  3. If you are big enough, you can destroy certain types of blocks. If you can't, get bigger then!
Credits

Made by team Dull Roar (Team 32) for Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022 game jam.

  • Game design - Hoork
  • Audio and Music - Mache30
  • Programming - Formidable Worm
  • Art - PotatoBoi42 and Bat_in_Spirit
  • Support - FreakyGamer and Lewbow
